data.name: Description.AccountRecoveryPrompt.Body
data.value: Would you like to recover your account?

data.name: Description.EmailToResetPassword
data.value: Enter your email to reset your password.

data.name: Description.EmailToRetriveUsername
data.value: Enter your email to retrieve your username.

data.name: Description.PasswordChangeEmail.BodyHtml.V2
data.value:
Dear {username},

We noticed you have changed the password for your account. If you didn't intend to change it, or you think someone else changed it by mistake, then we need you to contact customer support ({supportLink}) to change the password back. That way we will know for sure that your account is secure and safe.

If you are happy with your new password on Roblox, you don't have to do anything! It's already set up.
Please do not reply to this message. If you have any questions, please see the Roblox help page ({helpLink}).

data.name: Description.PasswordChangeEmail.BodyPlainText
Description.PasswordChangeEmail.BodyPlainText.V2
data.value:
Dear {username},

We noticed you have changed the password for your account. If you didn't intend to change it, or you think someone else changed it by mistake, then we need you to contact customer support ({supportLink}) to change the password back. That way we will know for sure that your account is secure and safe.

If you are happy with your new password on Roblox, you don't have to do anything! It's already set up.
Please do not reply to this message. If you have any questions, please see the Roblox help page ({helpLink}).

data.name: Description.PasswordChangeEmail.From
data.value: \"Roblox Password Reset\" {fromEmailAddress}

data.name: Description.PasswordChangeEmail.HtmlBody
data.value:
We noticed that the password changed for your Roblox account: {userName}. If you didn't intend to change it, or you think someone else changed it by mistake, please click this link to undo the action:
{urlShown}

If you are happy with your new Roblox password, you don't have to do anything! It's already set up. Please do not reply to this message. If you have any questions, please see the Roblox help page (https://www.roblox.com/help).

data.name: Description.PasswordChangeEmail.Subject
data.value: Roblox Password Reset

data.name: Description.PasswordResetEmail.Body.V2
data.value: {paragraphStart}Hello,{paragraphEnd}{paragraphStart}We have received a request to reset the password for your Roblox account: {emphasisStart}{emailOrUsername}{emphasisEnd}.{paragraphEnd}{paragraphStart}If you submitted this request, please click the button below to proceed:{paragraphEnd}

data.name: Description.PasswordResetEmail.BodyLower.HourAndMinutes
data.value: This button will be active for {passwordResetTicketHours} hour and {passwordResetTicketMinutes} minutes.{lineBreak}{paragraphStart}Thank You,{lineBreak}{emphasisStart}The Roblox Team{emphasisEnd}{paragraphEnd}

data.name: Description.PasswordResetEmail.BodyLower.HoursAndMinutes
data.value: This button will be active for {passwordResetTicketHours} hours and {passwordResetTicketMinutes} minutes.{lineBreak}{paragraphStart}Thank You,{lineBreak}{emphasisStart}The Roblox Team{emphasisEnd}{paragraphEnd}\t

data.name: Description.PasswordResetEmail.BodyLower.HoursOnly
data.value: This button will be active for {passwordResetTicketHours} hours.{lineBreak}{paragraphStart}Thank You,{lineBreak}{emphasisStart}The Roblox Team{emphasisEnd}{paragraphEnd}

data.name: Description.PasswordResetEmail.BodyLower.MinutesOnly
data.value: This button will be active for {passwordResetTicketMinutes} minutes.{lineBreak}{paragraphStart}Thank You,{lineBreak}{emphasisStart}The Roblox Team{emphasisEnd}{paragraphEnd}

data.name: Description.PasswordResetEmail.BodyLower.OneHourOnly
data.value: This button will be active for 1 hour.{lineBreak}{paragraphStart}Thank You,{lineBreak}{emphasisStart}The Roblox Team{emphasisEnd}{paragraphEnd}

data.name: Description.PasswordResetEmail.BodyLower.V2
data.value: This button will be active for {passwordResetTicketHours} hour(s), {passwordResetTicketMinutes} minute(s).{lineBreak}{paragraphStart}Thank You,{lineBreak}{emphasisStart}The Roblox Team{emphasisEnd}{paragraphEnd}

data.name: Description.PasswordResetEmail.ButtonText.V2
data.value: Reset Password

data.name: Description.PasswordResetEmail.Footer.V2
data.value: You are receiving this email because there has been an attempt to reset your password. If you did not make this request, do not reply to this email directly. Please contact {aTagStartWithHref}{supportPageLink}{hrefEnd}Roblox Support{aTagEnd} and change your password immediately.

data.name: Description.PasswordResetEmail.FooterUpdated.V2
data.value: You are receiving this email as there was a request to reset your password. If you didn't make this request, you can just ignore this email. Please review our help article for more information on {aTagStartWithHref}{accountSecurityLink}{hrefEnd}Account Security{aTagEnd}. Do not reply to this email as it will not be received. If you need assistance, please visit us at {aTagStartWithHref}{supportPageLink}{hrefEnd}Roblox Support{aTagEnd}.

data.name: Description.PasswordResetEmail.From
data.value: {escapeLiteralStart}Roblox Password Reset{escapeLiteralEnd} {fromEmailAddress}

data.name: Description.PasswordResetEmail.Header.V2
data.value: Roblox Account Password Reset

data.name: Description.PasswordResetEmail.HtmlBody
data.value: We have received a request to reset the password for your Roblox account: {emailOrUsername}{lineBreak}{lineBreak}If you submitted this request, please click the button below to proceed.{lineBreak}This button will be active for {passwordResetTicketHours} hours, {passwordResetTicketMinutes} minutes. If you do not wish to reset your password, please disregard this notice.{lineBreak}{lineBreak}{aTagWithStartHref}{resetPasswordUrl}{hrefEnd}{buttonStart}Reset Password{buttonEnd}{aTagEnd}

data.name: Description.PasswordResetEmail.Links.V2
data.value: {aTagStartWithHref}{AccountSafetyArticleLink}{hrefEnd}Account Safety{aTagEnd} | {aTagStartWithHref}{supportPageLink}{hrefEnd}Support{aTagEnd}

data.name: Description.PasswordResetEmail.PlainBody
data.value: We have received a request to reset the password for your Roblox account: {emailOrUsername}{lineBreak}{lineBreak}If you submitted this request, please click the link below or paste it into a web browser to proceed.{lineBreak}This link will be active for {passwordResetTicketHours} hours, {passwordResetTicketMinutes} minutes. If you do not wish to reset your password, please disregard this notice.{lineBreak}{lineBreak}{resetPasswordUrl}

data.name: Message.AccountSecurityTicketExpired
data.value: The account security ticket is expired.

data.name: Message.CantSendEmailWarning
data.value: If you did not give us a real email address when you created your account, we cannot send you an email.

data.name: Message.DefaultError
data.value: An error occurred, try again later.

data.name: Message.EmailForUsernameSuccessBody
data.value: An email with your username(s) has been sent to you if the email was previously saved on your account.

data.name: Message.EmailSuccessBody
data.value: An email with instructions has been sent to you if the email was previously saved on your account.

data.name: Message.EmailSuccessTitle
data.value: Email Sent

data.name: Message.EnterCode
data.value: A code was sent to your phone if it was previously verified on your account. Please enter it below

data.name: Message.EnterCodeSentToEmail
data.value: Enter the code we just sent to your email.

data.name: Message.PasswordResetExplanation
data.value: We can send you an email to remind you of your usernames or reset your password. Please enter your username or email and click one of the links below.

data.value: An SMS with your username(s) has been sent to you if the phone number was previously verified on your account.

data.value: Sorry, password reset requests expire {expirationHour} hours, {expirationMinute} minutes after issuance. Try requesting another password reset ticket again.

data.name: MessagePasswordResetTicketExpiredWithLink
data.value: Sorry, your password reset link has expired. Please visit the {aTagStartWithHref}{forgotPasswordLinkUrl}{hrefEnd}Forgot Password page{aTagEnd} to receive a new link.

data.value: Passwords do not match
